item.title: 📝 DaytimeDev/GitWrist (19 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: DaytimeDev

📝 Repository: DaytimeDev/GitWrist

📄 Descrizione: Link GitHub to your wrist using GitWrist for WearOS, allowing you to see git notifications, like Pull Requests and account info from anywhere -> a fun personal project of mine where the code is a mess

⭐ Stelle: 19

🍴 Forks: 1

💻 Linguaggio: Kotlin

📜 Licenza: MIT License
